item.title: 'Palworld': 6 Beginner Tips for Getting Started

item.title: The World's First Malaria Vaccine Program for Children Starts Now
item.description: On Monday, Cameroon became the first nation to establish routine childhood malaria immunizations. The race is on to give protection to as many people as possible.

item.title: Apple iOS 17.3: How to Turn on iPhone's New Stolen Device Protection

item.title: How to Organize Your Tech and Purge That Random Box of Cables

item.title: Cops Used DNA to Predict a Suspect’s Face—and Tried to Run Facial Recognition on It
item.description: Police around the US say they're justified to run DNA-generated 3D models of faces through facial recognition tools to help crack cold cases. Everyone but the cops thinks that’s a bad idea.
